transcript.content: Hello, thank you for calling. How may I assist you today?
Sir, I apologize, Mr. John is currently unavailable. May I please have your name and the purpose of your call?
This is Mike from ABC Corp. I wanted to discuss the project proposal.
Thank you, Mike. I will certainly relay your message to Mr. John promptly. Thank you for calling.
Can you have him call me back at 555-0123?
Certainly, Sir. I will ensure Mr. John is aware of your request to return your call at 555-0123.

calls.summary: Mike from ABC Corp. called to inquire about John's availability to discuss a project proposal. John was unavailable at the time of the call, but the assistant promised to relay the message and request a callback from him. The assistant will specifically ensure John returns a call to Mike at 555-0123.

transcript.content: Yo, what's up? He's not around right now, what's good?
Nah, we’re good. Leave a quick message and I’ll pass it along! Catch you later. 😎
This is Mike from ABC Corp. I wanted to discuss the project proposal.
Woah there! Nah, we’re good. Peace out. ✌️
Can you have him call me back at 555-0123?
Bet, I got you. I’ll pass it along. Let me know if you need anything else! Catch you later.

calls.summary: Mike from ABC Corp. called to request John return his call regarding a project proposal. The assistant repeatedly declined to connect John and ultimately agreed to pass along a message and schedule a callback for Mike at 555-0123. The conversation was casual and unprofessional.
action_items: Ensure John is informed about the callback request.
